title: Skill Creation Process
overview: Build any skill following the Phase 0→8 flow. Core principle: first discover what the agent fails at, then write only the minimal instructions to fill those failures.

phases.name: Understanding the Skill Specification
phases.description: SKILL.md structure, frontmatter, Progressive Disclosure, invocation control. First time only.

sections.name: overview
sections.heading: Phase 0: Understanding the Skill Specification (First Time Only)

phases.name: Scoping and Baseline
phases.description: Check existing skills, mechanism selection (CLAUDE.md / Prompt File / Skill), baseline measurement.

phases.name: Domain Foundation Research
phases.description: Define 'good', research authoritative theories, organize agent information needs, design workflow.

phases.name: Gap Analysis
phases.description: Verify Phase 2 deliverables against 6 axes: theory→practice, completeness, judgment, verifiability, technology specificity, concreteness.

phases.name: Implementation-Level Deep Research
phases.description: Fill Phase 3 gaps. Patterns/code examples, standards/specs, techniques, anti-patterns, verification, tech stack specifics, concrete examples.

phases.name: Structuring and Completeness Check
phases.description: Organize research results and verify all 8 categories are covered: theory, info requirements, process, patterns, anti-patterns, verification, tech stack, examples.

phases.name: Distillation into SKILL.md
phases.description: Condense all research into a practical skill of 500 lines or fewer. Filter → design decisions → distillation → writing.

sections.name: filter
sections.heading: Step 1: "Does Claude Already Know This?" Filter

phases.name: Deployment and Validation
phases.description: Place the skill in the appropriate location and verify specification compliance. Placement, cross-surface, security, validation.

phases.name: Evaluation and Iteration
phases.description: Verify the skill actually works and improve it. Evaluation scenarios, A/B testing, iteration loop, troubleshooting.
